items.sentence: Tom opened the envelope, pulled out the letter and unfolded it.
Tom told Mary he was interested in buying one of her paintings.
Tom was in a hurry so he left his second cup of coffee undrunk.
Do you think Tom would like to go camping with us next weekend?
How long do you think that it would take you to paint my house?
Tom gets angry when people don\'t do what they say they\'ll do.
We have to figure out a way to get this job finished by Monday.
Tom hasn\'t heard anything from Mary for more than three years.
Tom might have visited Mary in Boston last week. I\'m not sure.
As I\'ve gotten older, my opinions on many things have changed.
